TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TraceFilter extends System.Object

summary.span: 为跟踪筛选器实现提供基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for trace filter implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 跟踪侦听器将使用跟踪筛选器提供一层额外的筛选所没有提供的跟踪开关。Trace filters can be used by trace listeners to provide an extra layer of filtering beyond that provided by trace switches. 跟踪侦听器的跟踪筛选器可在该侦听器的属性。The trace filter for a trace listener can be found in the listener's property. 跟踪开关确定是否要发送到跟踪侦听器。Trace switches determine if a trace is to be sent to the trace listeners. 跟踪筛选器，以确定在跟踪为写入到关联的输出介质中的单个跟踪侦听器。Trace filters allow the individual trace listeners to determine whether or not the trace is to be written to the associated output medium. 例如，由每个跟踪筛选器，跟踪可能会写入到控制台中按，但不是记录到事件日志的。For example, as determined by each trace filter, a trace may be written to the console by a , but not to the event log by a . 筛选器继承自类可以由继承的跟踪侦听器类来执行筛选所跟踪的事件。Filters that inherit from the class can be used by trace listeners that inherit from the class to perform filtering of events being traced. 包含一个方法， ，它采用的事件数据并返回一个标志，指示是否应跟踪的事件。 contains a single method, , which takes event data and returns a flag indicating whether the event should be traced.

Public MustOverride Function ShouldTrace (cache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, formatOrMessage As String, args As Object(), data1 As Object, data As Object()) As Boolean

public: abstract bool ShouldTrace(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ cache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::String ^ formatOrMessage, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ args, System::Object ^ data1, cli::array <System::Object ^> ^ data);
abstract member ShouldTrace : System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache * string * System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType * int * string * obj[] * obj * obj[] -> bool

An array of argument objects.
A trace data object.
An array of trace data objects.

summary.span: 在派生的类中进行重写时，确定跟踪侦听器是否应跟踪事件。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the trace listener should trace the event.

returns.span: 若要跟踪指定的事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to trace the specified event; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以指示跟踪应时发生的事件的跟踪事件类型是否等于。The following code example shows how to override the method to indicate tracing should occur when the trace event type of the event is equal to . [!code-cpp[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/cpp/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/cs/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Diagnostics.TraceFilter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.diagnostics.tracefilter/vb/source.vb#2)]

para.span: 此方法的实现应返回如果应跟踪由传递的参数指定的事件。

span.span: Implementations of this method should return if the event specified by the passed parameters should be traced.
Otherwise the method should return .

para.span: 例如，允许使用唯一的错误事件来通过传递到侦听器的筛选器应检查参数和返回如果在跟踪事件类型级别设置为或更高版本; 否则为它应返回。

span.span: For example, a filter that allows only error events to pass through to the listener should inspect the parameter and return if the trace event type level is set to or greater; otherwise, it should return .

para.span: 方法的实现应准备好处理中的以下参数： ， ， ， ，并。

span.span: Implementations of the method should be prepared to handle in the following parameters: , , , , and .

para.span: 如果参数值，该参数不是事件的一部分。

span.span: If the parameter value is , the parameter is not part of the event.

para.span: 例如，如果参数是，这意味着事件不具有任何参数。

span.span: For example, if the parameter is , it means that the event does not have any arguments.

para.span: 如果参数是，则会出现一个或没有数据对象。

span.span: If the parameter is , then there are either one or no data objects.

para.span: 如果没有一个数据对象，它将位于参数。

span.span: If there is one data object, it will be found in the parameter.

para.span: 单个数据对象和数据对象的数组之间的区别的原因是为了性能。

span.span: The reason for the distinction between a single data object and an array of data objects is for performance.

para.span: 没有理由创建一个对象数组，如果只跟踪一个对象，如通常是这种情况。

span.span: There is no reason to create an object array if only one object is traced, as is normally the case.

para.span: 如果参数不是，则参数也不能。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the parameter must also not be .

para.span: 它可保证参数不是并且不为空字符串 ("")。

span.span: It is guaranteed that the parameter is not and not an empty string ("").

para.span: 方法的实现可以根据需要引发以下异常：

span.span: Implementations of the method can optionally throw the following exceptions:
- if is .
- if is not one of the values.

para.span: -与该方法的实现不相关的异常。

span.span: - Exceptions unrelated to the implementation of the method.
For example, a .
